data.title: 8 dollars for a small sandwich?
data.text: Have not been to Schlotzsky in a while and thought we'd try it. Oh now I remember...over priced fast food. Well, live and learn, not going there again. Good food just over priced.

user_location.name: Rio Rancho, New Mexico, United States

data.title: Best Sandwich ever! Thats just the start!
data.text:
We are always wanting to order a fresh sandwich from Schlotzkys!
The bread is the secret. They bake the loaves fresh every morning. The Fiesta Chicken is my favorite. They add a Chipotle mayonnaise that leaves you craving another bite. They also serve salads, pizza and Cinnabons! This place is the best place to grab a bite for lunch.

data.title: Chilling with the Sandwhiches
data.text: I have eaten there a few times last few weeks.  Seems like they try to cheat you out of your chips though, twice we had to go back and get them.  On the 3rd time, they gave us free meal.  Gotta keep an eye on them.

data.title: Shortstop for a Sandwich
data.text: A very clean establishment.  Order at the desk.  The sandwiches are very tasty and satisfying. Of course drinks and extra goodies are available.  A plain but friendly place for a quick sandwich and soft drink.  Certainly worthwhile.

data.title: Hasn't changed much over the years
data.text: This deli has been around for years and is still as good now as it was 10 years ago (the chain). Good food, tasty meats and good salads. This is a regular place for us

data.title: Great Sandwiches and pizza
data.text: Great location. The food is made fresh to order. Great salads. The wait time is minimal. My kids love the pizza.

data.title: Arrived late
data.text: Arrived just before closing and I hate to do that but like almost all restaurants in Rio Rancho it closes at 10PM. The staff was super nice even though we arrived at 9:55.

data.title: Variety deli with additional meal items
data.text:
Nice clean new deli with a good additional meal menu with pastas,flatbreads and more.The order taker was very nice explained food choices and even brought out the 
Flatbread board to show us the size. They have smaller portion meals to choose 2. Went with the 1\2 Margherita Flatbread and 1\2cran apple pecan salad with raspberry vinaigrette.Good size portions.Flatbread had roasted tomatoes,cheese and bbq sauce.Was tasty but maybe a little better without BBQ sauce and maybe garlic and oil.Also ordered 1\2 pizza Flatbread with Italian sausage and the  1\2  chilli soup. Took about 15 minutes for someone to come over to us to say they are out of the chill soup.No one else  was in there dining and the girl taking the order should have been advised. That along with not having coffee on the menu was 2 glitches.Especially ,no coffee if they are also selling Cinnabon there.
